title: Blue Essence Balance not the same
body: I'm confused it says that I have 178k balance but I completed the rune collector mission shouldn't I have the total balance?

replies.body: Hey Snu Snu, it looks like your last game marked you as AFK, so it might not have completed the mission.  Do you still have your missions in the tracker? Also after you complete your mission you get 1 or 2 Orbs that you'll need to open in Loot.  In total you should get 60k BE from the orbs.

Thank you for replying Django,
In regards to the missions in my tracker they are not showing up.

The same thing happened to me, Do you not get the amount it says? I don't get why they show you that number when you log in, then when you complete the mission you get a completely different number MUCH less

Hey (person who might need a name change :P),

It looks like you got your rewards and redeemed them.  Did you get less than you expected?
